    • inBusinessHours

      public static boolean inBusinessHours(LocalDateTime requestedStartLDT, LocalDateTime requestedEndLDT) throws DateTimeException
      This method evaluates if the requested appointment start/end times are during business hours (8:00AM - 10:00PM EST)
      Parameters:
      requestedStartLDT - user requested appointment start time
      requestedEndLDT - user requested appointment end time
      Returns:
      true if appointment start/end times are within business hours, false if not
      Throws:
      DateTimeException

    • isOverlappingTimes

      public static int isOverlappingTimes(boolean isNewAppointment, Customer customer, LocalDateTime requestedStartLDT, LocalDateTime requestedEndLDT)
      This method evaluates if user requested appointment date/time will overlap any existing appointments.
      Parameters:
      isNewAppointment - true if this appointment is a new appointment to be added, false if modifying existing appointment
      customer - Customer in which appointment is being scheduled
      requestedStartLDT - user requested appointment start date/time
      requestedEndLDT - user requested appointment end date/time
      Returns:
      returns 1 if overlap is found for user requested start date/time, returns 2 if overlap is found for user requested end date/time, returns 3 if an appointment is already scheduled between user requested start/end date/time, returns 4 if no overlap or no appointments are found for customer
